description:
Tested on revision 838.

This bug is introduced due to the changes done in revision No 835. boto_v6 module is not imported if the flag use_ipv6 is set to True.
title: Smoketests failing for ipv6

comments.content:
Tested on revision 838.

This bug is introduced due to the changes done in revision No 835. boto_v6 module is not imported if the flag use_ipv6 is set to True.
